modName: Sound of Skyrim  and ELE Interior Lighting Patch
summary: This simple patch makes possible to hear SoS sounds while using ELE Interior lighting.
descriptionHtml:
This simple patch makes possible to SoS and ELE Interior lighting to work together.
To work you MUST download both SoS Dungeons and SoS Civilization (SoS The wilds wasn't conflicting with ELE) and ELE Interior lighting.

You can find them:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8601/ SoS The Dungeons
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20193/ SoS Civilization
http://enbdev.com/enbseries/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1930 ELE Lighting

The load order should be:
SoS - The dungeons
SoS - The Wilds
SoS - Civilization
...
ELE DG - Interior Lighting (if you have dawnguard)
ELE HF - Interior Lighting (if you have hearthfire)
ELE DB - Interior Lighting (if you have dragonborn)
ELE - Interior Lighting
...
SoS-ELEPatch

Or simply refer to BOSS for load order, just put my patch after SoS and ELE.

This is a personal modification that I'm sharing with the community and all Credits go to Sounds of Skyrim creator and ELE Interior Lighting.
author: marmo1233
